original_text: They stop me from escaping. They are ready to destroy me. They do not need anyone to help them. They stop me from escaping.
korean_text: 그들이 내 길을 헐고 내 재앙을 재촉하는데도 도울 자가 없구나

sentences.original_text: They are ready to destroy me.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 나를 파멸시킬 준비가 되어 있다.

sentences.original_text: They do not need anyone to help them.
